Be warned: he defines 'monster' rather more liberally than most dictionaries.}} ==Useful info== '''Norbert''' was a unique human warrior you might have encountered in the mid-game. He was similar to [[Maud]] in most ways. He was removed in 0.8. ==Tips and tricks== Not a challenge, despite what the game would have you think. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]] [[Category:Human]]
